channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Agonizing Search in Texas, and a Looming Trade Deadline
item.description: Plus, what your TV knows about you.

item.title: Supreme Court Insists on Reams of Paper for Case Briefs in Digital Age

item.title: Texas Hill Country Is Underwater, and America’s Emergency Lifeline Is Fraying
item.description: With each passing day, the federal government is becoming less prepared to face the next big disaster.

item.title: U.K. business leaders are ‘struggling to see what’s business-friendly’ about Labour
item.description: The government is trying to balance business, unions, and a divided electorate. At the moment, it doesn’t appear to be satisfying any of them.

item.title: 2 Dead and 500 Injured After Typhoon Danas Strikes Taiwan

item.title: Trump Keeps Foreign Countries on Edge as Tariff Deadline Nears
item.description: The president is again threatening higher tariff rates on a dozen foreign nations, as a deadline elapses this week for making trade deals.

item.title: Indonesia Volcano Eruption Sends Ash Soaring 11 Miles High
item.description: The ash cloud above Mount Lewotobi Laki-laki on Monday was about four times taller than the one produced by an eruption there last month.
